channel.title: Handy Script on I Code You
channel.description: Recent content in Handy Script on I Code You

item.title: Remove all git files from a directory recursively
item.description: Go to your directory $ cd to/my/directory Find all git related files recursively and remove all ( find . -type d -name ".git" \ && find . -name ".gitignore" \ && find . -name ".gitmodules" ) | xargs rm -rf Credits: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4822321/remove-all-git-files-from-a-directory

item.title: Delete .DS_Store recursively
item.description: Go to your directory $ cd to/my/directory Find all .DS_Store files recursively and remove all $ find . -name '.DS_Store' -type f -delete Credits: https://jonbellah.com/articles/recursively-remove-ds-store

item.title: MacBook Pro Camera Built-in Not Working
item.description: Open a terminal and type: `$ sudo killall VDCAssistant` above command should fix Camera issue on Your MacBook Pro Source: https://discussions.apple.com/thread/4282533

item.title: Check jQuery version
item.description: Run below short code inside Firebug or Chrome Developer Tools Console and shortly you will notice output like this: > jQuery.fn.jquery > "1.8.3"
